modName: AOF HD Tree LODs and Vurt's Skyrim Flora Overhaul 2 Merged Edit For Compatibility
summary: Replaces original SFO 2.0 Tree LODs with double the quality version from An Old Friend.  Without my edit, your distant trees will look cut in half.  Also fixes some odd looking trees with unusually large stems.
descriptionHtml:
First, credit where credit is due:

An Old Friend HD Tree LODs
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24364/?

Vurt's Skyrim Flora Overhaul
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?

This is an edited dds image of AOF LODs instead of the original SFO 2.0 LODs. I did my best to preserve the quality saved to DXT5 with mipmaps @ 4096. The result was achieved by physically laying the AOF LODs over the SFO LODs then cutting out the SFO LODs that were overlapped by AOF. The original AOF LODs are normally incompatible with SFO 2.0, so use my version instead!

Please endorse if u like, and comment, I'd love to hear feedback!

---------------
Installation
---------------
1. Install SFO 2.0 ONLY

2. Install my edited image.
Data > Textures > Terrain > Tamriel > Trees

3. That's it! Your done!

-

Mods used in Example Images:
Climates of Tamriel
COT Weather Patch
Realistic Lighting Overhaul
Realistic Sun For COT ENB Version
Realistic Water Two
Watercolor For ENB
Lush Trees and Grass
Terrain Bump
Project ENB
Requiem Roleplaying Overhaul
+MANY HD Texture Mods
-For my current setup that I use the edit with, I installed SFO 2.0 thru the Skyrim Mod Combiner. Definitely a good decision if you are starting over. Or the Texture Pack Combiner for the more conservative.

Other Additonal Recommendations:
RCRN (Real Colors Real Nights) w/ ELFX and True Vision ENB
author: whosrakim
